text: {{Infobox writer | image = GrahamJoyce.jpg | imagesize = 150px | name = Graham William Joyce | caption = Graham Joyce signing books at Imagicon 2: Swecon 2009 | birth_date = | death_date = | birth_place = Keresley, England | occupation = Writer and teacher | genre = Speculative Fiction | website = }} Dr. Graham Joyce (22 October 1954 \- 9 September 2014Graham Joyce (1954-2014), obituary in Locus 9 September 2014) was an English writer of speculative fiction. He was the winner of many awards, including the O Henry Award, for both his novels and short stories. He was known for his book Dreamside. He sold Dreamside to Pan Books in 1991.+ Joyce died on 9 September 2014.
